question: I have had a pain on my ower left quardant of my abdomen since Feb. 2008. I have been seeing a specialist, but my pain continues to progress. I have has a CT scan, MRI and they have check my urine, but cannot find the problem.I have notice foam in the urine for over a week. Can you help. title: Foam in urine
